20110121130911.000|20110121130914.000|TR0|getting a chance to see this woman 
20110121130914.000|20110121130916.000|TR0|reunited with her mom and dad and they are 
20110121130916.000|20110121130918.000|TR0|hearing from Carlina White. She was 
20110121130918.000|20110121130920.000|TR0|kidnapped from a hospital in New York in
